panels.title: Percentage of distance driven at speed and temperature
Percentage of distance driven at temperature
Percentage of distance driven at speed

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  temperature, AVG(consumption) AS consumption
FROM (
  SELECT 
    ROUND(outside_temp_avg/($temperature_step*1.0)) * $temperature_step AS temperature, 
    (NULLIF(GREATEST(start_rated_range_km - end_rated_range_km, 0), 0)*cars.efficiency * (1.609*1000/distance)) AS consumption
  FROM 
    drives JOIN cars ON drives.car_id = cars.id WHERE drives.car_id = $car_id AND distance BETWEEN 1 AND 16
) S1 GROUP BY temperature ORDER BY temperature ASC

SELECT 
  temperature AS temperature3, AVG(consumption) AS consumption3
from (
  SELECT 
    ROUND(outside_temp_avg/($temperature_step*1.0)) * $temperature_step AS temperature, 
    (NULLIF(GREATEST(start_rated_range_km - end_rated_range_km, 0), 0)*cars.efficiency * (1.609*1000/distance)) AS consumption
  FROM 
    drives JOIN cars ON drives.car_id = cars.id WHERE drives.car_id = $car_id AND distance > 32 
) S1 GROUP BY temperature ORDER BY temperature ASC

panels.title: Short and long trip consumption at temperature

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  start_date::date AS time,
  consumption/(distance/100) AS consumption
FROM (
  SELECT 
    start_date,
    SUM(distance*consumption/100) OVER(ORDER BY start_date ROWS BETWEEN 1 PRECEDING AND 1 FOLLOWING) AS consumption,
    SUM(distance) OVER(ORDER BY start_date ROWS BETWEEN 1 PRECEDING AND 1 FOLLOWING) AS distance
  FROM (
    SELECT 
      start_date, SUM(distance) AS distance, 
      SUM(distance*consumption)/SUM(distance) AS consumption
    FROM (
      SELECT 
        TO_CHAR(start_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS start_date,
        (end_km-start_km) AS distance,
        (NULLIF(GREATEST(start_rated_range_km - end_rated_range_km, 0), 0)*cars.efficiency * (1.609*1000/distance)) AS consumption
      FROM 
        drives JOIN cars ON drives.car_id = cars.id  WHERE drives.car_id = 1 
    ) S1 WHERE consumption > 0 GROUP BY start_date ORDER BY start_date ASC
  ) S2 GROUP BY start_date, distance, consumption ORDER BY start_date
) S3 ORDER BY start_date

SELECT 
  start_date::date as time,
  round(temperature, 1) as temperature
FROM (
  SELECT 
    start_date,
    AVG(temperature) OVER(ORDER BY start_date ROWS BETWEEN 1 PRECEDING AND 1 FOLLOWING) AS temperature
  FROM (
    SELECT 
      start_date, avg(temperature) as temperature
    FROM 
      (
        SELECT 
          to_char(start_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as start_date,
          --(end_km-start_km) as distance,
          outside_temp_avg as temperature
        FROM 
          drives join cars on drives.car_id = cars.id  where drives.car_id = 1 
      ) S1 group by start_date order by start_date asc
  ) S2 group by start_date, temperature order by start_date
) S3 order by start_date

WITH S3 AS (
  SELECT 
    speed, temperature, COUNT(*) as samples,
    ROUND(AVG((power/speed)*1000), 1) AS consumption
  FROM (
    SELECT 
      ROUND((speed/1.609)/$speed_step)*$speed_step AS speed,
      ROUND(AVG(outside_temp/($temperature_step*1.0)) OVER(ORDER BY date ROWS BETWEEN 50 PRECEDING AND 50 FOLLOWING))*$temperature_step AS temperature,
      power
    FROM 
      positions WHERE car_id = $car_id and speed > 0 AND 
      (id%(100/$datapoints)::integer = 0 OR outside_temp IS NOT NULL) AND $__timeFilter(date)
  ) S1 WHERE temperature IS NOT NULL AND speed > 0 GROUP BY temperature, speed
)

SELECT
  speed, temperature, consumption, 
  (1000*('$aux'::json -> 'CurrentCapacity')::text::float/consumption) as range, 
  ROUND(100*(samples*speed)/(select sum(speed*samples) from S3), 3) as distance_percentage,
  ROUND((samples*speed)/(select sum(speed*samples) from S3 S4 WHERE S4.temperature = S3.temperature), 3) as at_temperature_percentage
FROM S3 WHERE consumption != 0 AND speed > 0 AND samples > (200*($datapoints/100.0)) ORDER BY temperature DESC, speed ASC

list.definition: SELECT name AS __text, id AS __value FROM cars ORDER BY display_priority ASC, name ASC;
list.name: car_id
list.query: SELECT name AS __text, id AS __value FROM cars ORDER BY display_priority ASC, name ASC;

list.definition:
-- CONCATENATED JOIN QUERIES TO IMPROVE PERFORMANCE
WITH
aux	AS
(
	SELECT cp.charge_energy_added,
		cp.car_id, cp.charge_energy_added / (cp.end_rated_range_km - cp.start_rated_range_km) * 100.0 AS rated_efficiency,
		(cp.end_rated_range_km - cp.start_rated_range_km) AS added_range_km
	FROM charging_processes cp
		JOIN (SELECT charging_process_id, MAX(date) as date
		FROM charges
		GROUP BY charging_process_id) AS last_charges
		ON cp.id = last_charges.charging_process_id
		INNER JOIN charges c
		ON c.charging_process_id = cp.id AND c.date = last_charges.date
	WHERE cp.car_id = $car_id
		AND cp.end_date IS NOT NULL
		AND cp.end_rated_range_km > cp.start_rated_range_km
	ORDER BY cp.end_date DESC 
	LIMIT 1
),  
CurrentCapacity	 AS
(
	SELECT AVG(Capacity) AS CurrentCapacity FROM
  (SELECT (100.0 * cp.charge_energy_added) / (GREATEST(1,MAX(usable_battery_level) - MIN(usable_battery_level))) AS Capacity	
    FROM charging_processes cp
	  INNER JOIN charges c	ON cp.id = c.charging_process_id
    INNER JOIN aux ON cp.car_id = aux.car_id
	  WHERE cp.car_id = $car_id AND cp.charge_energy_added >= aux.rated_efficiency AND cp.end_date >= date_trunc('month', current_date - interval '1 month') 
    GROUP BY  cp.charge_energy_added, cp.end_date
  ) AS lastEstimatedCapacity
), 
MaxCapacity AS
(
	SELECT MAX(c.rated_battery_range_km * cars.efficiency * 100.0 / c.usable_battery_level) AS MaxCapacity
	FROM charging_processes cp
		JOIN (SELECT charging_process_id, MAX(date) as date
		FROM charges
		GROUP BY charging_process_id) AS last_charges
		ON cp.id = last_charges.charging_process_id
		INNER JOIN charges c
		ON c.charging_process_id = cp.id AND c.date = last_charges.date
		INNER JOIN cars ON cp.car_id = cars.id
	WHERE cp.car_id = $car_id
		AND cp.end_date IS NOT NULL
		AND cp.end_rated_range_km > cp.start_rated_range_km
		AND c.charge_energy_added >= cars. Efficiency
), 
CurrentRange AS
(
    SELECT
		floor(extract(epoch from date)/86400)*86400 AS timecurrent,
		sum(rated_battery_range_km) / sum(usable_battery_level) * 100 AS rated_range_km
	FROM (
		SELECT battery_level, usable_battery_level, date,  rated_battery_range_km from charges c 
		JOIN charging_processes p ON p.id = c.charging_process_id 
		WHERE p.car_id = $car_id AND usable_battery_level IS NOT NULL) AS data
	GROUP BY 1
	ORDER BY 1 DESC
	LIMIT 1
), 
MaxRange AS
(
    SELECT
		floor(extract(epoch from date)/86400)*86400 AS time,
		sum(rated_battery_range_km) / sum(usable_battery_level) * 100 AS max_rated_range_km
	FROM (
		SELECT battery_level, usable_battery_level, date,  rated_battery_range_km from charges c 
		JOIN charging_processes p ON p.id = c.charging_process_id 
		WHERE p.car_id = $car_id AND usable_battery_level IS NOT NULL) AS data
	GROUP BY 1
	ORDER BY 2 DESC
	LIMIT 1
) 
SELECT  CONCAT('{"LastChargekWhAdded": ', aux.charge_energy_added, 
  ', "LastMileageAdded" : ', convert_km(aux.added_range_km,'$length_unit'),
  ', "MaxRange": ', convert_km(MaxRange.max_rated_range_km,'$length_unit'),
  ', "CurrentRange": ',convert_km(CurrentRange.rated_range_km,'$length_unit'),
  ', "MaxCapacity": ', MaxCapacity.MaxCapacity,
  ', "CurrentCapacity": ',CurrentCapacity.CurrentCapacity,
  ', "RatedEfficiency": ',aux.rated_efficiency, '}') 
FROM MaxRange, CurrentRange, Aux, MaxCapacity, CurrentCapacity;
-- The following query is the result of many tests and hours of work. This panel is for your own personal use. 
-- If you think you can improve it and contribute, please create a pull request and do not take it to your repository, 
-- much less upload it to another repository as if the original idea were yours, nor do you share it on social media
-- without mentioning the author. Respect the ingenuity and work of others. Cheers!
-- 16/04/2023
-- By @jheredianet - Twitter: @juanheredia
list.name: aux
list.query:
-- CONCATENATED JOIN QUERIES TO IMPROVE PERFORMANCE
WITH
aux	AS
(
	SELECT cp.charge_energy_added,
		cp.car_id, cp.charge_energy_added / (cp.end_rated_range_km - cp.start_rated_range_km) * 100.0 AS rated_efficiency,
		(cp.end_rated_range_km - cp.start_rated_range_km) AS added_range_km
	FROM charging_processes cp
		JOIN (SELECT charging_process_id, MAX(date) as date
		FROM charges

		ON cp.id = last_charges.charging_process_id
		INNER JOIN charges c
		ON c.charging_process_id = cp.id AND c.date = last_charges.date
	WHERE cp.car_id = $car_id

),

(
	SELECT AVG(Capacity) AS CurrentCapacity FROM
  (SELECT (100.0 * cp.charge_energy_added) / (GREATEST(1,MAX(usable_battery_level) - MIN(usable_battery_level))) AS Capacity	
    FROM charging_processes cp
	  INNER JOIN charges c	ON cp.id = c.charging_process_id

	  WHERE cp.car_id = $car_id AND cp.charge_energy_added >= aux.rated_efficiency AND cp.end_date >= date_trunc('month', current_date - interval '1 month')

  ) AS lastEstimatedCapacity

MaxCapacity AS
(
	SELECT MAX(c.rated_battery_range_km * cars.efficiency * 100.0 / c.usable_battery_level) AS MaxCapacity
	FROM charging_processes cp
		JOIN (SELECT charging_process_id, MAX(date) as date

		GROUP BY charging_process_id) AS last_charges
		ON cp.id = last_charges.charging_process_id
		INNER JOIN charges c

		INNER JOIN cars ON cp.car_id = cars.id
	WHERE cp.car_id = $car_id

(

		floor(extract(epoch from date)/86400)*86400 AS timecurrent,

MaxRange AS
(

		floor(extract(epoch from date)/86400)*86400 AS time,

	FROM (
		SELECT battery_level, usable_battery_level, date,  rated_battery_range_km from charges c 
		JOIN charging_processes p ON p.id = c.charging_process_id 
		WHERE p.car_id = $car_id AND usable_battery_level IS NOT NULL) AS data
	GROUP BY 1
	ORDER BY 2 DESC
	LIMIT 1
) 
SELECT  CONCAT('{"LastChargekWhAdded": ', aux.charge_energy_added, 
  ', "LastMileageAdded" : ', convert_km(aux.added_range_km,'$length_unit'),
  ', "MaxRange": ', convert_km(MaxRange.max_rated_range_km,'$length_unit'),
  ', "CurrentRange": ',convert_km(CurrentRange.rated_range_km,'$length_unit'),
  ', "MaxCapacity": ', MaxCapacity.MaxCapacity,
  ', "CurrentCapacity": ',CurrentCapacity.CurrentCapacity,
  ', "RatedEfficiency": ',aux.rated_efficiency, '}') 
FROM MaxRange, CurrentRange, Aux, MaxCapacity, CurrentCapacity;
